@description.name: @description
@description.body: A collection of assertions. These methods can be used to assert incoming parameters, return values, â€¦ If an assertion fails an {@link AssertionError} is thrown. Assertions are used in unit tests as well.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Assert that the condition evaluates to true. An {@link AssertionError} is thrown if otherwise.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
comment {String} Message to be shown if the assertion fails. This
    message is provided by the user.
@param.description:
Message to be shown if the assertion fails. This
    message is provided by the user.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: much better performance

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Convert an unknown value to a string to display in error messages

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} any value
@param.description: any value

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} a string representation of the value
@return.description: a string representation of the value

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Assert that the condition evaluates to true.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: condition {var} Condition to check for. Must evaluate to true.
@param.description: Condition to check for. Must evaluate to true.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: msg {String?} Message to be shown if the assertion fails.
@param.description: Message to be shown if the assertion fails.

@param.description: Message to be shown if the assertion fails.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: compact {Boolean?false} Show less verbose message. Default: false.
@param.description: Show less verbose message. Default: false.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Assert that the value is true (Identity check).

@param.description: Condition to check for. Must be identical to true.

@param.body: msg {String?} Message to be shown if the assertion fails.
@param.description: Message to be shown if the assertion fails.

@description.name: @description

@description.body: Assert that an event is fired.

invokeFunc {Function} The function which will be invoked and which
   fires the event.
@param.description:
The function which will be invoked and which
   fires the event.

@param.body:
listenerFunc {Function?null} The function which will be invoked in the
   listener. The function receives one parameter which is the event.
@param.description:
The function which will be invoked in the
   listener. The function receives one parameter which is the event.
